channel.title: Chaotic's Help Weird problem[PI]
channel.description: Well i recently added chaotics to my server, Iv'e added it fully server sided aswell so it goes into the right slot, has the standing + running stances and emote, but the only problem is that it weilds it and thats all fine but its a little weird as you can see from the pictures below, Anyone know how to fix it? [IMG]http://img203.imageshack.us/img203/5875/cls.png[/img] [Img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/9922/rapieri.png[/img] [Img]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/2138/maulupload.png[/img]

item.title: Chaotic's Help Weird problem[PI]
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

The thing is…people just take the newer verison of models and export then and add. They don’t fix them, the model has to be raised in a model program go look in the model section on how to do so.

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotic's Help Weird problem[PI]
item.dc:creator: @yash yash
item.description:
@yash wrote:

Bump, I still need help with this and i dont know how to raise the height.

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotic's Help Weird problem[PI]
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

I had this problem on a different client I was trying out months and months back. You have to actually edit the model and raise it’s height (or something like that) in order for it to work, because the items were really made to work with a different client.

Read full topic
